about_the_game:
Customise your Portal Knights characters with this stylish selection of fantastic headwear. Items include:

- Bowler Hat
- Mosca Mask
- Monocle
- Apple Hat
- Venetian Mask

Stand out from your friends with this stylish additions to your character while exploring Elysia. Just equip these vanity hats to see it for yourself!

The world of Elysia needs YOU! Join this cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG to level up your character, craft epic weapons, conquer enemies in real-time, and build almost anything! Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom(tm) 8450 Triple-Core Processor (3 CPUs), ~2.1GHz or Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 470 (1Gb VRAM) / ATI Radeon TM HD 6870 (1Gb VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
